NAME: Manisha Pawar - PMP
ABOUT:
A senior Business Analyst, experienced in working on Cross-functional teams in a deadline-driven, project-oriented environment. Experienced in Business analysis across Middle/Back office functions, Valuation and Regulatory reporting & Compliance projects (FATCA, FCA, CRM).

Seeking to build and leverage on my extensive range of domain, technical & Project Management skills to add value to the Organization practice area and assure a productive and effective delivery on Projects.
